title: No Limit S03 - Hardcoded Eng Subs - Sno
description:
No Limit S03 - Hardcoded Eng Subs - Sno

The tough action thriller returns for a third series as undercover agent Vincent tackles more criminal networks for secret government organisation Hydra.

1/8. Vincent seeks out his father Claude, a notorious criminal in the Marseille underworld, because he badly needs a liver transplant after ingesting toxic gas on his last mission. Can he track him down?

2/8. Vincent must bring down a trafficker in counterfeit notes, Jacques Brunetti, who is a candidate in the Marseille elections and an old friend-turned-rival of Claude. But Juliette is also targeting him.

3/8. Claude tries to regain his old ground in Marseille but is kidnapped and taken to the Russian consulate. And he's made such an art of evading the police that Juliette and Vincent struggle to find him.

4/8. Hidden in an air freight container, Vincent, Claude and young agent Zoe are transported to Chechnya. It's a tense game of survival, but can they avoid capture without causing a diplomatic incident? 

5/8. Vincent pursues a ship carrying a haul of cocaine to Marseille but fails to locate the illegal cargo. It's a race against time to find the missing drugs at sea before Juliette's team beat him to it.

6/8. The Liberati family go on a weekend away for a special birthday celebration, but a team of Colombians are sent to Marseille to recover the missing drugs haul and suspicion increasingly falls on Claude.

7/8. Things go from bad to worse for Vincent when he is implicated in Claude's cocaine trafficking case, and then a face from the past kidnaps Lola and orders him to rob a bank in exchange for her release.

8/8. In order to secure Lola's release from her kidnappers, Vincent and Claude must coordinate a bank robbery, and this time even a reluctant Juliette offers to help them, but their fate is uncertain.
